pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, January 23, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

La Loche, Saskatchewan

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement, and hold a media availability. Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Ralph Goodale will be in attendance.

Gymnasium
Dene High School
La Loche Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive to the gymnasium door at the rear of the school no later than 8:00 a.m.
